page.title: 11THE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: Livingston shopping centre is completely under cover and includes some large chainstores eg. Woolco, Presto, Fine Fare and John Menzies as well as dozens of smaller shops. A large proportion of the people who work in the centre are teenagers who take part time jobs such as shelf-packing and working on the tills. Right next to the shopping centre is the Bus Station. This is conveniently placed between Glasgow and Edinburgh and so plays a major part in the bus network of Central Scotland. Livingston Development Corporation has recently moved all of its offices to the town centre as has the local Police Station Livingston Centre also has massive car parking facilities.
